name: Dance With Memes
description: Dance With Memes is very simple arcade game. Play with your favorite Twitch emotes using music/videos from internet or your hard drive. Test your skill and compare it with other players. The key is precision - smashing buttons will get you nowhere. Game supports Steam Leaderboards for Youtube videos.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: X1950 Pro, 7900 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
